name: Wizard Hentai Survivors
description:
Wizard Hentai Survivor is a fast paced bullet-hell roguelike with RPG mechanics. You are a lone wizard who got Isekai'd into a forest and suddenly beautiful half naked women have started appearing all around your home! What could be the cause of this? Will you save them? Find out the answers to these questions and more!

Explore the woods, grow powerful, cast spells and upgrade your Wizard! Of course most important of all, save naked women!
In this fantasy roguelike bullet hell you'll find various monsters you'll have to slay with your abilities. Occasionally you'll find the odd treasure or two which will also augment your powers. For some reason there are over 100 naked women in the forest as well ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Featuring stunning anime AI waifus to collect, upgrades and map objectives to explore, increase your powers and find out the story of Wizard Hentai Survivor!

Features
-100+ Girls to collect
-Multiple weapon types
-Story Mode
-Unlockable characters
-RPG Style progression
-Roguelike upgrade system
-Various difficulties
